function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive coefficients of population flow correlated with higher infection ratios","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict control measures in areas with high positive coefficients of population flow","Technologies":"Geospatial technology for tracking population movement","People":"Resident population, travelers, and commuters","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Positive correlation between population density and infection ratio","Impact":"Higher infection ratios in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Reduce population density in heavily affected areas","Technologies":"Urban planning and zoning regulations","People":"Residents in densely populated areas","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, local governments"},{"Description":"Differences in infection ratio relationships between inland and coastal areas","Impact":"Varying infection rates between inland and coastal regions","Mitigation":"Tailored public health strategies for inland and coastal areas","Technologies":"Health data analytics and spatial analysis","People":"Residents of inland and coastal regions","Owner":"Public health authorities, epidemiologists"}]}
